name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Cloud Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing and deploying high-performance applications, specifically tailored for compliance-driven industries such as healthcare and finance. An expert in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with hands-on experience in infrastructure as code using **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Packer**. Proficient in containerization technologies like **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes** for seamless deployment and scaling. 
Skilled in backend development leveraging **Python**, **Node.js**, and **Java**, with additional expertise in scripting using **Bash** and **Ruby**. Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines facilitated by **Jenkins** and utilizing version control through **Git**. 
Deep experience in monitoring and logging solutions involving **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, **Graphite**, and **ELK** stack, ensuring high standards of cloud security and performance optimization. Proven ability to implement **Continuous Deployment** strategies and build resilient cloud-native architectures that align with modern operational practices.
